AEA.AEAText: The National Weather Service has issued a Tornado Warning for Spark County. A Tornado has been spotted on the ground 2 miles south of Smallville. This tornado is moving Northeast at 40 MPH. A Tornado is on the ground in the area of Smallville, Tinytown and Route 83. Take cover now. Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. Move to the closest shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

El Servicio Meteorolo Nacional emitia Advertencia de Tornado para el Condado de Spark. Un Tornado se ha observado 2 millas al sur de Smallville. Este tornado se est oviendo hacia el noreste a 40 mph. Un tornado est n el suelo en la zona de Smallville, Tinytown y la ruta 83. Tome refugio ahora. Muse a una habitaci nterior en el piso bajo de un edificio robusto. Evite las ventanas. Muse al refugio cercano y protse de los desechos voladores.
